Question content: Kuyini imali yeholo?
Explanation: Iholo yimali oyitholayo njalo. Ngenjwayelo, lemali uyithola ngokuyisebenzela (ngokudayisa noma ngomsebenzi omunye) kodwa izipho, ama{donation} kanye nemiklomelo ibala njenge holo.

Question content: Imali oyitholayo njalo ngesikhathi esithile ibizwa ngani?
Explanation: Iholo yimali oyitholayo njalo. Ngenjwayelo, lemali uyithola ngokuyisebenzela (ngokudayisa noma ngomsebenzi omunye) kodwa izipho, ama{donation} kanye nemiklomelo ibala njenge holo.

Question content: Ngokwezimali, kuyini ama {{earnings}}?
Explanation: Ama {earning} imali abantu abayihola ngomsebenzi. Awayibali imali yama {donation} noma izipho zemali nemiklomelo

Question content: Imali oyithola emsebenzini ibizwa ngani
Explanation: Iholo lenyanga yimali oyithola emsebenzini ngenyanga. Ebantwini abaningi, iholo labo liqhamuka emsebenzini. Abanye basebenza imisebenzi eminingi la imlai iqhamuka khona

Question content: Ibizwa ngani imali oyithola njalo ngenyanga
Explanation: Iholo lenyanga yimali oyithola emsebenzini ngenyanga. Ebantwini abaningi, iholo labo liqhamuka emsebenzini. Abanye basebenza imisebenzi eminingi la imlai iqhamuka khona

Question content: Ukusebenza yiyona yodwa yini indlela yokuthola iholo?
Explanation: Izindlela ezihlukile sokuthola iholo ziphatha iholo lenyanga, iholo le {wage}, ukudayisa, kanye nama {donation}.

Question content: Ukuba nebhizinisi lakho yindlela yokwenza imali
Explanation: Akubona bonke abantu abasebenzela abanye abantu. i{Profit} ongayenza ngebhizinisi lakho yindlela ehlakaniphile yokuthola i{income}

Question content: Izindlela ezahlukile zokuthola imali zibizwa ngani
Explanation: Imvelaphi yeholo ifaka iholo lenyanga neholo lama {wage} (kwabasebenzea abanye abantu), i{commission}, ukudayisa, ama{donation}, kanye ne mela ebuya kuzitshalo mali ({return on investment}).

Question content: Kuyini {{imali}} engena {{ekhaya}} ({{household income}})?
Explanation: Imali engena ekhaya ({household income}) yimila yabo bonke abantu abahlala ekhaya ndawonye. Kunabantu abangaholi endlini, abangafaki imali endlini, njengezingane ezincane.

Question content: Umuntu uyakwazi yini ukuba namaholo ({source of income}) angaphezulu kweholo eliyi 1?
Explanation: Ungaba nemisebenzi namaholo amaningi, uma nje ukhokha intela efanele kulawomaholo

Question content: Yiziphi ezibaliwe ezingena eholweni lasendlini ({household income})
Explanation: Iholo, impesheni, nemali ebuya kuzitshalo mali ({return on investments}) yizindlela abantu abathola ngayo izimali. Zonke zibalwa ngezindlela zokuthola imali esaholo.

Question content: Imali yeqolo ({child support}) iyabalwa yini njenge holo
Explanation: Imali yeqolo ({child support} noma i{maintenance}) yimali ekhokhwa ngumzali wengane komunye umzali ukunakekela ingane. Ibalwa njenge holo

Question content: Ama {donation} abala njenge holo
Explanation: Ngisho ngabe ama {donation} engabali njengemali esetshenzelwe, ayabalwa njengeholo. Abaluleke kakhulu kuma {non-profit organization} ngoba ahola ngama {donation}.

Question content: Kuyini izindleko ({expenses})?
Explanation: Izindleko yimikhiqizo ({products}) nama {service} osebenzisa imali kuwo njenge {airtime}. Uyazikhethela ukuthi usebenzisa malini ezindlekweni zakho

Question content: Ibizwa ngani imali yonke oyisebenzisayo ngenyanga?
Explanation: Imali yonke oyisebenzisayo ngenyanga ({monthly expenses}) imali yonke oyisebenzisa ngenyanga ebala i{rent}, ama{rates}, igrosa, i{Insurance} kanye ne {transport}

Question content: Yini elinye igama lokubiza yonke imali oyisebenzisa ngenyanga?
Explanation: Ngokwezimali, isambha semali oyisebenzisa ngenyanga sibizwa nge {monthly spend}. Leyo yimali yazo zonke izinto ozikhokhelayo ngenyanga isihlanganisiwe

Question content: Iyiphi kulezi ekungenye indlela yokusho imali oyisebenzisa nganyanga ({monthly expenses})?
Explanation: Imali yonke oyisebenzisayo ngenyanga ({monthly expenses}) ibizwa nge {{monthly expenditure}}. Ibala i{rent}, ama{rates}, igrosa, i{Insurance} kanye ne {transport}

Question content: Kuyini izindleko ezingajiki {fixed expenses}?
Explanation: Izindleko ezi {fixed} yizindleko ezingajiki ngezinyanga kanjenge {school fees} ne {rent}. Noma zinganyuka, azishintshi ngokuzisebenzisa kwakho.

Question content: Into oyikhokhelayo ({expense}) engajiki ngenyanga ibizwa ngani?
Explanation: Izindleko ezi {fixed} yizindleko ezingajiki ngezinyanga kanjenge {school fees} ne {rent}. Noma zinganyuka, azishintshi ngokuzisebenzisa kwakho.

Question content: Kuyini izindleko ze {variable expense}?
Explanation: Ama {variable expenses} ashintsha kakhulu ngokuwasebenzisa kanjenge {airtime} noma i{account} yesitolo la othenga khona izimpahla

Question content: Izindleko ({expense}) ezijika kakhulu zibizwa ngani?
Explanation: Ama {variable expenses} ashintsha kakhulu ngokuwasebenzisa kanjenge {airtime} enyuka nokunyuka kwendlela oyisebenzisa ngayo

Question content: Yiziphi izinto ezibalwa njengezindleko {expenses}?
Explanation: Igrosa, i{rent}, kanye ne {airtime} yizindleko. Ezinye izindleko, kanjenge grosa noma i{rent}, zibalulekile kunezinye (kanjenge {airtime})

Question content: Yiziphi izinto ezingabalwa njengezindleko?
Explanation: Impesheni ({pension}) uhlobo lweholo, kanti u{petrol} nezinto zokugeza ne {DSTV} yizindleko. Kodwa ukukhokha imali kuyi {pension fund} kungena ezindlekweni

Question content: Iyiphi kwezibaliwe ekuyisibonelo sendleko e{fixed}?
Explanation: Kule {list} yi {school fees} kuphela esiyindleko e{fixed} ngoba sijwayele ukungashintshi unyaka wonke. i{Airtime} ne {data} kushintsha kakhulu ngendela okusebenzisa ngayo

Question content: Yini kulezi ezibaliwe okuyizindleko ezingajiki ({fixed expense})
Explanation: Kulezizinto ezibaliwe, i{rent} iyo yodwa okuyiindeko eyingajiki ngesikhathi eside. i{Airtime} negrosa kushintsha ngokuzisebenzisa kwakho

Question content: Iyiphi indleko ({expense}) ejikayo ({variable}) kwezibhaliwe?
Iyiphi kulezi eyi {variable expense}?
Explanation: i{Data} iyo yodwa i{variable expense} ngoba ingashintsha ngezinyanga ngokuyisebenzisa kwakho

Question content: Uma wenza i{budget}, yini isizathu sokungayifaki intela yeholo ({income tax}) ezindlekweni?
Explanation: Intela imali esuswa eholweni ungakalitholi. Ihlukile ezindlekweni ngoba awukwazi ukukhetha ukungayikhokhi. Kepha uyikhokha intela uma uhola imali ethize noma ngaphezulu

Question content: Uma wenza i{budget}, yini isizathu sokungayifaki i{UIF} ezindlekweni?
Explanation: i{UIF} imali esuswa eholweni ungakalitholi. Ihlukile ezindlekweni ngoba awukwazi ukukhokha kancane kuyo. Akusiwo wonke umuntu okhokha i{UIF}

Question content: i{Rent} kungaba yizindleko, noma kube yiholo
Explanation: {Rent} ingena ezindlekweni uma uyikhokha. Kodwa uma umuntu ekhokha i{rent} kuwe, kungaba yiholo

Question content: Imali esuswa eholweni ibizwa ngani?
Explanation: Abanye abanta bakhishelwa ama {deductions} {before} iholo. i{UIF} kanye nentela ama {deductions} aphoqekile owakhokha ungakaholi. Umqashi engakuthathela ama {deductions} afana ne {medical aid}

Question content: Asuswa nina ama {deduction} eholweni lakho?
Explanation: Uma unawo ama {deduction}, asuswa ngumqashi wakho. Uma usuhola, ama {deduction} asthethiwe

Question content: Yiziphi izinto ezijweyele ukuba ngama {deductions}?
Explanation: i{UIF} kanye nentela ({income tax}) yizo zodwa izinto ezibhaliwe ezingama {deductions} eholo. Zonke ezinye izindleko. Ama {deductions} ahlukile ekuthni abanjwa ungakayitholi imali yakho

Question content: Yini echaza ama {deductions} awe {{UIF}} kahle?
Explanation: i{UIF} iyi {deduction} ekhokhwa yiningi labaqashi nabasebenzi. Imele i{Unemployment Insurance Fund} - i{insurance} ebekwe uhulumeni ekhokhela abantu uma bephelelwa um'sebenzi (ngezizathu izithize)

Question content: Yiziphi izinto ezingama {deductions} eholweni?
Explanation: Intela yeholo intela ephoqelekile kubantu abahola imali ethile. Ngonyaka ka 2020, umaa ungaphansi kwa 65 {years}, kumele ukhokhe intela uma uhola ngaphezu kuka R79 000 ngonyaka (R6 583 ngenyanga)

Question content: Iyiphi kulezi ekungesiyo i{deduction}
Explanation: i{Airtime} ijwayele ukuba yi {expense}, hayi i{deduction}

Question content: Ama {deduction} nezindleko yinto efanayo
Explanation: Ama {deduction} nezindleko izinto ezihlukene. Ama {deduction} athathwa ungakalitholi iholo, kanti izindleko uzikhokha usuholile, futhi uyakwazi uku {control}a izindleko kakhudlwana

Question content: i{Medical aid} ingaba yi {deduction} futhi ibe yi {expense}
Explanation: Uma uzikhokhela i{medical aid}, iba yi {expense}. Uma ukhokhelwa ngumqashi ungakaholi, iba yi {deduction}

Question content: Ikuphi la i{medical aid} engesiyona i{deduction}
Explanation: Uma umqashi ekukhokhela i{medical aid}, ayibalwa ezindlekweni zakho, ibalwa kuma {deduction}. Kuyenzeka umqashi ekukhokhele i{medical aid} ngokugcwele, lapho ayibalwa kuma {deduction}.

Question content: Wonke umuntu osebenzayo unama {deduction} na?
Explanation: Akuwona wonke umuntu onama {deduction}. Abanye abantu bahola kancane ukukhokha intela yeholo. Ngokunjalo, i{UIF} ayikho kuma {public servant} nabantu abasebenza ngaphansi kwamahora angu 24 ngenyanga

Question content: i{Rent} iyisibonelo se {deduction} yeholo
Explanation: i{Rent} ibalwa ezindlekweni ezi {fixed}, hayi kuma {deductions}. Lokhu yingoba ayithathwa eholweni ungakalitholi

Question content: Umele ini u {UIF} ngokwezimali eziphathelene nawe?
Explanation: i{Unemployment Insurance Fund} ({UIF}) yisikhhungo esisiza abantu abaphelelwe ngumsebenzi ngokubakhokhela bengakawutholi omunye umsebenzi. Akuwona wonke umuntu ongathola i{UIF}.

Question content: Yaziwa ngani imal oyikhokhela i{UIF}
Explanation: Uma usuke wayibona i{UIF} kuyi {payslip} yakho ungazi ukuthi kuyini kahle kahle, yimali oyikhokhela i{insurance} yabantu abangaqashiwe

Question content: Ivela kuphi imali ye {UIF} yabantu abaphelelwe ngumsebenzi?
Explanation: Ngokomthetho, abasebenzi kanye nabaqashi abaningi bakhokhela i{Unemployment Insurance Fund} ngokuhlanganisiwe. i{Maximum} yeholo elingathathelwa i{UIF} ngu 1%

Question content: Ubani okumele enze ama {deduction} ekhokhele i{UIF} eholweni lakho?
Explanation: Uma i{UIF act} ikuthinta, kumele umqashi wakho eyithathe i{UIF} ungakakhokhelwa iholo

Question content: Ikhona yini imisebenzi la i{UIF} engangeni khona
Explanation: i{UIF} ayingeni ebantwini abangama {public servant}, abafundi, nabantu abavela kumanye amazwe beze ngomsebenzi, kanye nabasebenzela umqasha ngaphansi kwa 24 {hours} ngenyanga

Question content: Uyakwazi ukuthola izimali ze {UIF} uma ungayikhokheanga i{UIF} na?
Explanation: Uma uphelelwa ngumsebenzi awukwazi ukuthola imali kuyi {UIF} uma ubungayikhokheli i{UIF}

Question content: Ingxenye engakanani yeholo engathathelwa i{UIF} ngokomthetho
Explanation: Imali ye {UIF} idingeka ngokomthetho ebasebenzini nasebaqashini. Abasebenzi nabaqashi kumele beyikhokhele bobabili, futhi imali yakho ingaba ngaphezu kwe 1% weholo

Question content: Kuyini intela ye {{personal income tax}}?
Explanation: Intela ye {personal income tax} imali efanele ukukhokhwa ngokomthetho kuhulumeni evela emaholweni abasebenzi. Ikubona bonke abasebenzi abakhokha intela, futhi ayilingani intela ekhokhwa ngabantu

Question content: Ubani okumele ekhokhe intela ekuyi {personal income tax}?
Explanation: Intela yeholo intela ephoqelekile kubantu abahola imali ethile. Ngonyaka ka 2019, umaa ungaphansi kwa 65 {years}, kumele ukhokhe intela uma uhola ngaphezu kuka R78 150 ngonyaka (R6 512.50 ngenyanga)

Question content: Isigaba seholo la abantu ekumele bakhokhe khona intela sibizwa ngani?
Explanation: Akuwona wonke umuntu okhokha intela eholweni. Kukhona izigaba ezihlukile ngobudala bakho nemali oyihola ngenyanga. Ngaphezu kwalokho, intel iyi {percent} lemali oyiholayo

Question content: Ibaphi kulaba abanyeke bekhokhe intela?
Explanation: Ungasho ukuthi abantu abahola kakhulu njengabemeli nama {CEO} banayo imali yokubanjelwa intela, la umuntu ongasebenzi engenayo imali yokukhokhela intela

Question content: Ubani oshoyo ukuthi abasebenzi kumele bekhokhe intela engakanani?
Explanation: Umqashi wakho kumele ekubambhele imali yentela, kodwa abakhethi ukuthi ukhokha malini. Uhulumeni oshoyo ukuthi ukhokha malini enteleni

Question content: Isiphi isikhungo sikahulumeni esishoyo ukuthi kumele ukhokhe intela engakanani?
Explanation: i{South African Revenue Service} eyaziwa nge {SARS} iyisikhungo sikahulumeni esithatha intela e{South Africa}

Question content: Umele ini u{SARS}?
Explanation: i{South African Revenue Service} eyaziwa nge {SARS} iyisikhungo sikahulumeni esithatha intela e{South Africa}

Question content: Abantu bajwayele ukukhokhela intela kanjani?
Explanation: Uma usebenzela umqashi la uhola khona imali ebanjelwa intela, kumele leyo ntela ikhokhwe ungekaholi - k'shuthi ingena kuma {deduction}. Ungayibona kuyi {payslip} leyo ntela

Question content: Intela ye {income tax} yingxenye yeholo labantu eliya kuhulumeni
Explanation: Njengezakhamuzi, sikhokha intela kuhulumeni azikhokhela ama {service} esiwasebenzisayo kanjengemigwaqo, izibedlela, izikole, kanye nogesi.

Question content: Wonke umuntu ukhululekile ukuzikhethela ukukhokha intela noma cha
Explanation: Uma kumele ukhokhe intela, kumele uyikhokhe ngokomthetho. Uma ungayikhokhi ungajeziswa futhi ungangena ejele

Question content: Wonke umuntu ukhokhela intela ngisho ngabe uhola malini
Explanation: Kunemali okumele uyihole khona uzokwazi ukukhokhela intela. Uma uhola imali ye {minimum wage} angeke ukhokhele intela

Question content: Intela isetshenziselwa ini?
Explanation: Njengezakhamuzi, sikhokha intela kuhulumeni azikhokhela ama {service} esiwasebenzisayo kanjengemigwaqo, izibedlela, izikole, kanye nogesi.

Question content: Izinga lentela olikhokhelayo libizwa ngani?
Explanation: Imali yentela okumele uyikhokhe iyishintsha ngokushintsha kwemali oliholayo. Ngamanye amazwi, kunama {tax rate} ahlukile ngokwemali oyiholayo

Question content: Izinga leholo la oqala khona ukukhokhela intela libizwa ngani?
Explanation: Akuwona wonke umuntu okhokha intela eholweni. Kukhona izigaba ezihlukile ngobudala bakho nemali oyihola ngenyanga. Ngaphezu kwalokho, intel iyi {percent} lemali oyiholayo

Question content: Imali yentela oyikhokha ngonyaka incike kuphi kakhulu?
Explanation: u{SARS} oshoyo ukuthi kumele kukhokhwe intela ye {percent} elingakanani kubantu abahola imali engakanani. Uma uhola kakhulu ukhokha intela enkulu. Ungaxhumana no {SARS} ukuthola izilinganiso zentela

Question content: Uqala nini futhi uphela nini unyaka wentela e{South Africa}?
Explanation: Unyaka wentela uqala ngo {March} uphele ngo February wonyaka olandelayo. Ngokwesibonelo, u 2019 wentela uqale ngo 1 {March} 2018 uphele ngo 28 {February} 2019

Question content: Ithini i{tax threshold} yabantu abangaphansi kuka 65 okwamanje?
Explanation: Intela yeholo intela ephoqelekile kubantu abahola imali ethile. Ngonyaka ka 2020, uma ungaphansi kwa 65 {years}, kumele ukhokhe intela uma uhola ngaphezu kuka R79 000 ngonyaka (R6 583 ngenyanga)

Question content: Ithini i{tax threshold} yabantu abaphakathi kwa {{65}} no {{75}} okwamanje?
Explanation: Ngonyaka wentela wa 2020, uma ungaphakathi kwa 65 no 75 ubudala, uhola ngaphansi kuka R10 191 ngenyanga, iholo lakho alikhokhi intela. Ngamanye amazwi, awuyikhokhi intela

Question content: Ithini i{tax threshold} yabantu abangaphezulu kuka 75? okwamanje
Explanation: Ngonyaka wentela wa 2020, uma ungaphezulu kuka 75 ubudala, uhola ngaphansi kuka R11 395 ngenyanga, iholo lakho alikhokhi intela. Ngamanye amazwi, awuyikhokhi intela

Question content: i{Percent} lentela olikhokhayo lincike emalini oyiholayo
Explanation: Intela okumele uyikhokhe incike emalini oyiholayo. Ngokwenjwayelo, uma uhola kakhulu ukhokha intela enkulu

Question content: Ama {rate} entela ye {income tax} awashintshi ngeminyaka
Explanation: Ungathuka ukuthi ukhokha intela enkulu kulonyaka ngisho ngabe iholo alinyukanga. Isizathu yingoba intela iyanyuka ngonyaka

Question content: Unyaka wentela e {South Africa} uqala ngo {January}
Explanation: Unyaka wentela e{South Africa} uqala ngo {March} uphele ngo February wonyaka olandelayo. Ngokwesibonelo, u 2020 wentela uqale ngo 1 {March} 2019 uphele ngo 29 {February} 2020

Question content: Kuyini i{{gross salary}}
Explanation: Ngokwesibonelo: Umuntu othatha umsebenzi oholele R10 000 ngenyanga okuyi {gross salary}. Ngemuva kwama {deduction} kanjenge ntela kanye ne {UIF}, engagcina ethole R9 300 ngenyanga

Question content: Libizwa ngani iholo lakho uma ama {deduction} engakathathwa?
Explanation: Uma ubuzwa ukuthi uhola malini, ubuzwa nge {gross salary} ungakathathelwa ama {deduction}, hayi imali oyithola esandleni. Kubanye abantu, kunomehluko omkhulu kulezi nombholo

Question content: Uma kukhangiswa ({advertising}) umsebenzi, kubhalwa liphi iholo ngenjwayelo?
Explanation: Uma ubona i{advertisement} yomsebenzi, kujwayele ukuba yi {gross salary} ebhaliwe, hayi i{net}

Question content: Uma ungayazi i{gross} yeholo lakho, ungayithola kuphi?
Explanation: Uma uthola i{payslip} kumqashi, ifanele ukubhalwa i{{gross salary}}, ama {deduction}, kanye ne {net salary}. Uma kungenjalo ungacela kumqashi wakho

Question content: i{{Gross salary}} ijwayele ukubankulu kuyi {payslip}
Explanation: Uma unganaso isiqiniseko sokuthi iyiphi imal okuyi {gross salary}, bheka i{amount} enkulu kunemali oyitholayo eholweni kuyi{payslip}. Kungaba yona i{gross salary}

Question content: i{Gross} yeholo isho iholo uma esethathiwe ama {deduction}
Explanation: Imali oyithola uma ama{deduction} esethathile ibizwa nge {{net slary}}. i{Gross salary} imali umqashi akhokhela wena yona engakathathi ama {deduction}

Question content: i{Gross} yeholo isho iholo uma engakathathwa ama {deduction}
Explanation: Imali oyithola uma ama{deduction} engakathathwa ibizwa nge {{gross slary}}. Kubanye abantu, umehluka phakathi kwalezimali mukhulu

Question content: Uma umuntu ekutshela imali ayiholayi ingakathathwa intela, usho ini?
Explanation: Ngisho ngabe intela yeholo kungeyona yodwa i{deduction} ekhona, abantu babiza i{gross} ngemali abayihola {before tax}. Indlela esho kancono lokhu ukuthi imali abayiholayo "{before deductions}"

Question content: Imali ogcina uyitholile ngokweholo ibizwa ngani?
Explanation: Imali oyitholayo ngempela esandleni uma ama {deduction} esethathiwe ibizwa nge {net salary}. Iyona mali oyisebenzisayo uku {cover} izindleko

Question content: Kuyini i{net salary}
Explanation: Ngokwesibonelo: Umuntu othatha umsebenzi oholele R10 000 ngenyanga okuyi {gross salary}. Ngemuv kwama {deduction} kanjenge ntela kanye ne {UIF}, engagcina ethole R9 300 ngenyanga

Question content: Libizwa ngani iholo esethathiwe ama {deduction}
Explanation: Imali oyatholayo {grand grand} ekupheleni kwenyanga i{nett}. i{gross} ijwayele ukbekwa ne {net}

Question content: i{Net salary} imali yitholayo esethathiwe ama {deduction}
Explanation: i{{Net salary}} iholo umuntu asala nalo uma sekuthathiwe ama {deduction} afana nantela ne {UIF} i{Gross} imali oyithola kungakathathwa ama {deduction}

Question content: Imisebenzi emakethwayo ijwayele ukusho i{net salary}
Explanation: Uma ubona umsebenzi umakethwa, kuzobi yi {gross salary} ngoba i{net} iyahluka ebantwini

Question content: Kuyenzeka yini i{net salary} ibe nkulu une {gross salary}?
Explanation: i{Net salary} iyohlale incane noma ilingana ne {gross salary} ngoba i{net} kusuke kuyi {gross} ethathelwe ama {deduction}

Question content: Kuyenzeka yini i{gross} ilingane ne {net} yakho?
Explanation: Ebantwini abaningi iholo langenyanga ilo lodwa iholo abalitholayo. Uma loyo ebuzwa nge mali ye {gross}, engasho i{gross} loholo lakhe

Question content: Uma ungenawo ama {deduction}, i{gross} ne {net salary} zizolingana
Explanation: i{Net} ne {gross salary} iyafana uma ungenawo ama {deduction}. Lokhu kungenzeka uma unganayo i{UIF} futhi uhola kancane ukukhokha intela

Question content: Yonke imali oyitholayo {after} ama {deduction} ibizwa nge _____________
Explanation: i{Gross} yimali oyitholayo kuwe wonke amaholo akho uma esethathiwe ama {deduction} anjenge ntela. Uma uholo iholo elilodwa, i{net} yakho yi {net} yeholo lakho

Question content: Kuyini i{gross income}
Explanation: i{Gross} yakho inhlanganisela yawo wonke amaholo owatholayo, engakathathwa ama {deduction}. Ama {deduction} engasuswa ezimalini zama {commission}, ama {donation}, kanye namatoho aseceleni

Question content: Kuyenzeka yini i{gross income} ilingane ne {net income} yakho?
Explanation: Ebantwini abaningi iholo langenyanga ilo lodwa iholo abalitholayo. Lapho, i{net income} ne {net salary} zabo ziyalingana

Question content: i{Gross salary} ne {gross income} zihlale zilingana
Explanation: Uma unganawo ama {deduction} futhi ungayikhokhi i{UIF} ngoba uhola kancane, i{net} ne {gross} yakho ziyafana. Uma usebenza eminye imisebenzi, i{net income} yakho ingaba nkulu kune {gross salary} yakho

Question content: Yonke imali oyitholayo {after} ama {deduction} ibizwa nge _____________
Explanation: i{Net} yimali oyitholayo kuwe wonke amaholo akho uma esethathiwe ama {deduction} anjenge ntela. Uma uholo iholo elilodwa, i{net} yakho yi {net} yeholo lakho

Question content: Ichaza ukuthini i{net income}
Explanation: i{Net} imali oyitholayo kuwo wonke amaholo owatholayo esethathiwe ama {deduction}. Ibala imali oyitholayo kuma {commission}, ama {donation} noma amatoho aseceleni

Question content: i{Net} yeholo yimali ogcina iyotholile esandleni (noma kuyi {account} yakho noma ngo {cash})
Explanation: Imali oyithola uma ama{deduction} esethathile ibizwa nge {{net slary}}. Ingalingana ne {gross} uma engenawo ama {deduction} ngoba uhola imali encane engathathelwa intela, kodwa ijwayele ukuba ncane

Question content: i{Net income} yakho ingavela endaweni eyodwa kuphela
Explanation: i{Net income} yanhlanganisela yawo wonke amaholo owatholayo usubanjelwe ama {deduction}. Uma uhola ngeholo elilodwa, i{net income} yakho i{net salary} yakho

Question content: i{Net income} ne {net salary} kuyalingana njao
Explanation: i{Net} yeholo ilangana ne {net} yakho uma iholo kuyiyona yodwa indlela ohola ngayo, kodwa ingaba nkulu uma uhola kwezinye izindawo njengama toho

Question content: Kuyenzeka yini i{gross} ibe ncane kune {net} yakho?
Explanation: Iholo lakho le {net} alikwazi ukubalikhulu kune {gross} ngoba i{net} yimali esele kuyi {gross} uma kuthathwa ama {deduction}

Question content: Uma umuntu engenawo ama {deduction}, i{gross salary} ingalingana ne {net salary}
Explanation: Uma unganawo ama {deduction} futhi ungayikhokhi i{UIF} ngoba uhola kancane, i{net} ne {gross} yakho ziyafana

Question content: Kuyini indleko ({expense}) eyisidingo ({necessary})?
Explanation: Izindleko eziyisidingo izindleko ekungaphileki ngaphandle kwazo kanjenge ndawo yokuhlala ({rent}/{mortgage}), ukudla, amanzi, i{transport} yasemsebenzini noma iskole, nogezi ebantwini abaningi

Question content: Into odingayo ukusebenzisa imali kuyo ibizwa ngani?
Explanation: Izindleko eziyisidingo izindleko ekungaphileki ngaphandle kwazo kanjenge ndawo yokuhlala ({rent}/{mortgage}), ukudla, amanzi, i{transport} yasemsebenzini noma iskole, nogezi ebantwini abaningi

Question content: Yini kulezi ekuyindleko eyisidingo
Explanation: Ukudla kuyindleko ekungaphileki ngaphandle kwayo. Ubucwebe, izinto zezinwele kanye nezinto zemidlalo ungakhetha ukuthi uyazithenga noma cha ngoba akusizo izidingo

Question content: Iyiphi kulezi ekuyindleko engabalulekile?
Explanation: Ngisho ngabe u{ice ream} uyinto edliwayo, uyakwazi ukuphila ngaphandle kwawo. Lokho kuwenza ube yindleko engasiso isidingo, unga {saver} imali ngokungawuthengi

Question content: Ikuphi ukudla la okuyindleko engabalulekile?
Explanation: Ngisho ngabe u{ice ream} uyinto edliwayo, uyakwazi ukuphila ngaphandle kwawo. Lokho kuwenza ube yindleko engasiso isidingo, unga {saver} imali ngokungawuthengi

Question content: Ezinye izindleko zibalulekile kunezinye
Explanation: Ngenjwayelo, izimpahla ziyisidingo, angeke uphile ungenazo. Kodwa izimpahla ezintsha unazo ezisebenzayo yindleko engenasidingo

Question content: Ukuya kuma {restaurant} kuyindleko ebalulekile?
Explanation: Akunalutho olu {wrong} ngokudla ukudla e {restaurant} uma ukhona ukukuthenga. Kodwa unga {saver} imali ngokudla endlini noma ukuphatha isikhaftini

Question content: Ngabe yonke into edliwayo iyindleko ebalulekile na?
Explanation: Akunalutho olu {wrong} ngokudla ukudla e {restaurant} uma ukhona ukukuthenga. Kodwa unga {saver} imali ngokudla endlini noma ukuphatha isikhaftini

Question content: Kujwayelekile ebantwini ukusebenzisa imali ezindlekweni ezingabalulekile
Explanation: Abantu abaningi uthola ukuthi basebenzisa imali ezintweni ezingasiso isidingo. Akusilo icala, kodwa ukusebenzisa imali ngobuhlakani ukwazi umehluko ezintweni eziyidingo nekungesizo

Question content: Imali osala nayo uma usukhokhele izidingo ibizwa ngani?
Explanation: i{Discretion} ichaza ukuthi {{ungazikhethela}}, k'shuthi i{discretionary income} yimali esalayo eholweni uma izidingo usuzikhokhele - kanjengo kudla

Question content: Uma usukhokhele izidingo, imali esalayo ibizwa ngani?
Explanation: Kahle kahle, uma usukhokhele izinto ozidingayo njenge {rent} negrosa, usalelwa yimali ogayisebenzisa ngokubona. Lemali ibizwa nge {discretionary income}

Question content: i{Discretionary income} imali uokukhokhela izinto ekungesizo izidingo
Explanation: i{Discretionary income} yimali onayo usuzikhokhele izidingo. Iyona ongayisebenzisela ukuthenga izinto njezimpahla ezintsha ongazidingi, nokuyodla ema {restaurant}

Question content: Yini kulezi engakhokhelwa nge {discretionary income}?
Explanation: Kahle kahle, kumele uthenge izinto ezingasizo izidingo njenge {Play Station} uma usuzikhokhele izidingo - ngamanye amazing, uma une {discretionary income} eyanele

Question content: Iyiphi kulezi ekumele iphume kuyi {discretionary income}?
Explanation: Indlela ehlakaniphile yokusebenzisa i{discretionary income} ukuyi {saver} kunokusebenzisa ezintweni zobumnandi yonke

Question content: Iyiphi kulezi ekumele iphume kuyi {discretionary income}?
Explanation: Izinto ekungesizo izidingo kumele uzikhokhele nge {discretionary income}. Ngamanye amazwi, kumele ukhokhele izidingo kuqala

Question content: Amanzi nogesi ajwayele ukukhokhelwa nge {discretionary income}
Explanation: Amanzi nogesi - nezinto ezinjenge grosa ne{rent} - yizinto eziyizidingo ekumele uzikhokhele kuqala. Uma unemali esele eholweni ({discretionary income}), ungayisebenzisela izinto zobumnandi

Question content: i{Discretionary income} isebenziselwa ukukhokhela ubumnandi nezinto ezimnandi njengama holidi?
Explanation: i{Discretionary income} yimali onayo esele uma usukhokhele izinto eziyisidingo. Iyona ongayisebenzisela izinto njengokudla oku {fancy}, ukuya kuma {dinner}, nezimpahla ongazidingi

Question content: {Discretionary income} = {net income} - izindleko eziyisidingo
Explanation: i{Net income} yimali osala nayo esethathiwe ama {deduction}. Iyona ekhokhela izidingo njengendawo yokuhlala, ukudla, nogesi. Imali esele kulokho yi {discretionary income}

Question content: Uma ungenamali esele uqeda ukukhokhela izidingo, awunayo i_______________
Explanation: Uma ungasalelwa mali usukhokhele izidingo kanjengo gesi noma i{rent}, awunayo i{discretionary income}

Question content: Wonke umuntu kumele azimisele ukusala nemali ekupheleni kwenyanga ({discretionary income})
Explanation: Ukuba nemali esele ekupheleni kwenyanga ({discretionary income}) indlela e {safe} yokuphila. Uyakwazi uku {saver} khona uzoba nemali uma kuvela isidingo

Question content: Indlela yokuchaza i{financial security} ukuthini?
Explanation: i{Financial security} ukuba nemali eyanele ukukhokhela impilo oyiphilayo, futhi unenye imali yoku {saver}. Uma usele nemali eholweni kaningi, une {financial security} kahle

Question content: Kubizwa nga ukuba nemali ekuphele kwenyanga?
Explanation: Ukuba ne {financial security} ukuba nemali eyanele uku {cover} izidingo zakho kanye nezikweletu njalo ngenyanga. Ukuba ne {financial security} kahle ukuba nemali eyanele ukuze uyibeke njalo ngenyanga

Question content: Ukuba nemali eyanele ukuthokhela impilo yakho, futhi ube nemali ekupheleni kwenyanga, kubizwa ngani?
Explanation: i{Financial security} ukuba nokuthula wazi ukuthi unemali eyanele yokukhokhela izidingo ube unemali onayo yezidingo nezinye izinto ofuna ukuzenza ngemali

Question content: Udinga imali engekanani ukuze ube ne {financial security}?
Explanation: i{Financial security} ukuba nemali eyanele ukukhokhela impilo oyiphilayo, futhi unenye imali yoku {saver}. Uma usele nemali eholweni kaningi, une {financial security} kahle

Question content: Ukuba ne {discretionary income} eningi kusho ukuthi ungaba {financially secure}
Explanation: Imali yoku {saver}, yama {emergency}, kanye ne {retirement} ziqhamuka kuyi {discretionary income}. K'shuthi uma uneningi, ungaba ne {financial security}

Question content: Ungaba ne {financial security} uma ungenayo i{discretionary income}
Explanation: Imali yoku {saver}, yama {emergency}, kanye ne {retirement} ziqhamuka kuyi {discretionary income}. K'shuthi uma ungenayo, ungebe ne {financial security}

Question content: Abantu abahola imali eningi bahlale bene {financial security}
Explanation: i{Financial security} ayiveli ngeholo kuphela, kuya ngokuthi usalelwa imali engakanani yeholo. Kuyenzeka ube ne {financial security} kakhulu kunomuntu ohola kakhulu kunawe

Question content: Awukwazi ukuba ne {financial security} uma uhola kancane
Explanation: Ngisho ngabe uhola malini, uma iholo likhokhela izidingo futhi unemali esele ekuphele kwenyanga, une {financial security}. Ukuhola kakhulu akusiyo i{guarantee} ye {financial security}

Question content: Uma engenayo imali eyanele yokukhokhela izidingo, kuthiwani?
Explanation: Uma ekupheleni kwenyanga awunayo imali eyanele, usenkingeni futhi awunayo i{financial security}

Question content: Kumele ubeke imali uma ungenayo eyanele yokukhokhela izindleko
Explanation: Ukuze ube ne {financial security} ube {right}, kumele ukwazi ukukhokhela izindleko kuqala. Uma sezikhokhelwe, usunga {saver}

Question content: Ukuba {financially secure} kwenza ukwazi ukwenza ini?
Explanation: Ukuba {financially secure} kusho ukuthi awudingi ukuba ne {stress} ngemalingoba zonke izinto zakho uyakwazi ukuzikhokhela, futhi usala nemali ekupheleni kwenyanga

Question content: Yini eyenza ukwaiz ukubeka imali?
Explanation: Ukuze ukwazi ukubeka imali ({saver}), kumele ube nemali eyanele yokukhokhela izindleko kuqala futhi usalelwe ngenye. Ngamanye amazwi, kumele ubu ne {financial security} kuqala

Question content: Uma unemali eyanele kuma {emergency}, Usuke unjani?
Explanation: Uma u {financially secure} ngempela, kumele ube nemali eyanele yokukhokhela izindleko zakho, futhi nenye esele yokukhokhela izindleko zama {emergency}

Question content: Uma u {financially secure}, uyakwazi ukukhokhela izidingo futhi uku {saver}
Explanation: Uma u {financially secure}, unemali eyanele uma kuvela izinto ezidinga ukukhokhelwa zama {emergency}. Uma kukhona okufayo noma ugula, ungakhokhela lezizinto ungabolekanga mali

Question content: Ukuba {financially secure} kwenza kube nzima uku {saver for} i{retirement}
Explanation: Ukuba ne financial security kwenza ukwazi uku{save}ela i{retirement}. Lokhu kwenzeka uma unemali eyanele ongayibeka ekupheleni kwenyanga

Question content: Unayo yini i{financial security} uma kumele uboleke imali ukukhokhela izinto?
Explanation: Ingxenye enkulu yokuba {financially secure} yikuba nemali eyanele yokukhokhela izindleko ezingalendelekile. Abantu abane {financial security} abadingi ukuboleka uma kuvela lezindleko

Question content: Ukuba ne {financial security} kwenza ukwazi yini ukulawula izikweletu zakho?
Explanation: Uma kumele ulokhu uboleka imali ukukhokhela izindleko, uzithola ulokhu uboleka ukukhokhela izikweletu ezilokhu zinyuka. Ukuba ne {financial security} kwenza ukwazi ukunciphisa izikweletu

Question content: Yini kulezi engakusiza ube {financially secure} kakhulu?
Explanation: Ukuthola iholo elikhulu yindlela yokuba ne {financial security}, kodwa akuyona yodwa. Ukunciphisa imali oyisebenzisayo ezindlekweni yindlela ehlakaniphile yokuthola i{financial security}

Question content: Uku {saver} imali la ongakwazi khona kubizwa ngani?
Explanation: Ukunciphisa izindleko ezingenasidingo yinto ongayenza manje ukuba ne {financial security}. Ungathola ukuthi unganciphisa imali oyisebenzisayo kakhulu ngokwenza njalo

Question content: Isinyathelo sokuqala ekubeni {financially secure} ukwenza ini?
Explanation: Ukunciphisa izindleko ezingenasidingo yinto ongayenza manje ukuba ne {financial security}. Ukwenza i{budget} kungakubonisa ukuthi unganciphisa imali kuphi.

Question content: Yini kulezi engasiza ukunciphisa izindleko ezingenasidingo?
Explanation: Ukwenza i{budget} yindlela yokubona ukuthi usebenzisa imali kuphi kanjani. Kungakubonisa ukuthi yikhuphi la osebenzisa khona imali ngokungesidingo

Question content: Ukuthola iholo elikhulu iyona yodwa indlela yokuba {financially secure}
Explanation: Ukuthola iholo elikhulu yindlela yokuba ne {financial security}, kodwa akuyona yodwa. Ukunciphisa imali oyisebenzisayo ezindlekweni yindlela ehlakaniphile yokuthola i{financial security}

Question content: Ukunciphisa imali oyisebenzisayo ezintweni ezingenasidingo indlela yokuqala ekubeni {financially secure}
Explanation: Uma imali onayo inganeli ukukhokhela izikweletu onazi, ungacabanga ukuthi kumele uhole kakhulu. Kumele uqale ngokunciphisa izinto ezingenasidingo osebenzisa imali kuzona

Question content: Ukuthenga igrosa la ebiza khona kancane yindlela elungile yokunciphisa ukusebenzisa kwakho kwemali
Explanation: Kungenza umehluko omkhulu kuyi {financial security} yakho uma ubona ukuthi izinto zibiza malini, uthenge la ezibiza kancane khona

Question content: Ukusebenzisa i{WiFi} la oyithola khona indlela enhle yokonga imali
Explanation: Izinto ezincane njengokusebenzisa i{WiFi} uma ikhona (emsebenzini noma kephi) kuze uzonciphisa i{data} oyisebenzisayo okuzomele uyikhokhele

Question content: Ukwenza i{budget} yindlela e{right} yokubona ukuthi usebenzisa imali kanjani
Explanation: Ukwenza i{budget} yindlela yokubona ukuthi usebenzisa imali kuphi kanjani. Kungakubonisa ukuthi yikhuphi la osebenzisa khona imali ngokungenasidingo
